description: GFX-1260 touchscreen unresponsive or laggy after software update
recommended_action: Factory reset and reinstall Precision-IQ from USB - check for latest firmware on Trimble support

description: GFX-750 display reboot loop at startup
recommended_action: Verify power supply voltage (12V clean) - replace internal battery if date/time resets

description: NAV-900 losing RTK fix in tree lines or near buildings
recommended_action: Check antenna cable connections - verify CenterPoint RTX subscription active - update firmware

description: NAV-500 SBAS corrections slow to converge
recommended_action: Allow 15-20 min warm-up - verify clear sky view - check SBAS satellite availability in region

description: EZ-Pilot Pro steering motor slipping on column
recommended_action: Retorque motor clamp - inspect column adapter ring - verify correct adapter for tractor model
Re-run steering calibration wizard - check friction wheel contact - inspect motor gear teeth

description: CenterPoint RTX accuracy degraded to decimeter
recommended_action: Check subscription expiration - verify NAV-900 firmware supports latest RTX corrections

description: RangePoint RTX drifting more than 6 inches pass-to-pass
recommended_action: Normal for RangePoint tier - upgrade to CenterPoint for sub-inch - check antenna mounting

description: Field-IQ not detecting implement sections on ISOBUS
recommended_action: Verify ISOBUS cable connections - check implement TC configuration - update Field-IQ firmware

description: TrueTracker hunting side-to-side on flat ground
recommended_action: Re-calibrate implement steering - check hydraulic valve response time - verify hitch sensor

description: Trimble Ag Software sync failing - data stuck on display
recommended_action: Check WiFi connection on display - verify Trimble account credentials - force sync from cloud

description: GreenSeeker readings inconsistent across boom width
recommended_action: Clean sensor lenses - check mounting height (32 inches) - verify wiring connections

description: WeedSeeker 2 false triggers in heavy stubble
recommended_action: Adjust sensitivity threshold - raise sensor height - update detection firmware

description: YieldTrak yield map showing stripes or gaps
recommended_action: Re-calibrate with weigh wagon - check clean grain elevator sensor mounting - verify GPS

description: CAN bus communication errors between display and receiver
recommended_action: Check CAN termination resistors - inspect cable for damage - verify baud rate settings
